verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them, When either man <WH376> or woman <WH802> shall separate <WH6381> themselves to vow <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> of a Nazarite <WH5139>, to separate <WH5144> themselves unto the LORD <WH3068>: to separate: or, to make themselves Nazarites

He shall separate <WH5144> himself from wine <WH3196> and strong drink <WH7941>, and shall drink <WH8354> no vinegar <WH2558> of wine <WH3196>, or vinegar <WH2558> of strong drink <WH7941>, neither shall he drink <WH8354> any liquor <WH4952> of grapes <WH6025>, nor eat <WH398> moist <WH3892> grapes <WH6025>, or dried <WH3002>.

All the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145> shall he eat <WH398> nothing that is made <WH6213> of the vine <WH3196> tree <WH1612>, from the kernels <WH2785> even to the husk <WH2085>. separation: or, Nazariteship vine: Heb. vine of the wine

All the days <WH3117> of the vow <WH5088> of his separation <WH5145> there shall no razor <WH8593> come <WH5674> upon his head <WH7218>: until the days <WH3117> be fulfilled <WH4390>, in the which he separateth <WH5144> himself unto the LORD <WH3068>, he shall be holy <WH6918>, and shall let the locks <WH6545> of the hair <WH8181> of his head <WH7218> grow <WH1431>.
All the days <WH3117> that he separateth <WH5144> himself unto the LORD <WH3068> he shall come <WH935> at no dead <WH4191> body <WH5315>.

He shall not make himself unclean <WH2930> for his father <WH1>, or for his mother <WH517>, for his brother <WH251>, or for his sister <WH269>, when they die <WH4194>: because the consecration <WH5145> of his God <WH430> is upon his head <WH7218>. consecration: Heb. separation
All the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145> he is holy <WH6918> unto the LORD <WH3068>.

And if any man <WH4191> die <WH4191> very <WH6621> suddenly <WH6597> by him, and he hath defiled <WH2930> the head <WH7218> of his consecration <WH5145>; then he shall shave <WH1548> his head <WH7218> in the day <WH3117> of his cleansing <WH2893>, on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall he shave <WH1548> it.

And on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> he shall bring <WH935> two <WH8147> turtles <WH8449>, or two <WH8147> young <WH1121> pigeons <WH3123>, to the priest <WH3548>, to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH6213> the one <WH259> for a sin offering <WH2403>, and the other <WH259> for a burnt offering <WH5930>, and make an atonement <WH3722> for him, for that <WH834> he sinned <WH2398> by the dead <WH5315>, and shall hallow <WH6942> his head <WH7218> that same day <WH3117>.

And he shall consecrate <WH5144> unto the LORD <WH3068> the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145>, and shall bring <WH935> a lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a trespass offering <WH817>: but the days <WH3117> that were before <WH7223> shall be lost <WH5307>, because his separation <WH5145> was defiled <WH2930>. be lost: Heb. fall

And this is the law <WH8451> of the Nazarite <WH5139>, when <WH3117> the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145> are fulfilled <WH4390>: he shall be brought <WH935> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>:

And he shall offer <WH7126> his offering <WH7133> unto the LORD <WH3068>, one <WH259> he lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish <WH8549> for a burnt offering <WH5930>, and one <WH259> ewe lamb <WH3535> of the first <WH1323> year <WH8141> without blemish <WH8549> for a sin offering <WH2403>, and one <WH259> ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> for peace offerings <WH8002>,

And a basket <WH5536> of unleavened bread <WH4682>, cakes <WH2471> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, and wafers <WH7550> of unleavened bread <WH4682> anointed <WH4886> with oil <WH8081>, and their meat offering <WH4503>, and their drink offerings <WH5262>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, and shall offer <WH6213> his sin offering <WH2403>, and his burnt offering <WH5930>:

And he shall offer <WH6213> the ram <WH352> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002> unto the LORD <WH3068>, with the basket <WH5536> of unleavened bread <WH4682>: the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH6213> also his meat offering <WH4503>, and his drink offering <WH5262>.

And the Nazarite <WH5139> shall shave <WH1548> the head <WH7218> of his separation <WH5145> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and shall take <WH3947> the hair <WH8181> of the head <WH7218> of his separation <WH5145>, and put <WH5414> it in the fire <WH784> which is under the sacrifice <WH2077> of the peace offerings <WH8002>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the sodden <WH1311> shoulder <WH2220> of the ram <WH352>, and one <WH259> unleavened <WH4682> cake <WH2471> out of the basket <WH5536>, and one <WH259> unleavened <WH4682> wafer <WH7550>, and shall put <WH5414> them upon the hands <WH3709> of the Nazarite <WH5139>, after <WH310> the hair of his separation <WH5145> is shaven <WH1548>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> them for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>: this is holy <WH6944> for the priest <WH3548>, with the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785>: and after <WH310> that the Nazarite <WH5139> may drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196>.

This is the law <WH8451> of the Nazarite <WH5139> who hath vowed <WH5087>, and of his offering <WH7133> unto the LORD <WH3068> for his separation <WH5145>, beside that that his hand <WH3027> shall get <WH5381>: according <WH6310> to the vow <WH5088> which he vowed <WH5087>, so he must do <WH6213> after the law <WH8451> of his separation <WH5145>.
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175> and unto his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, On this wise <WH3541> ye shall bless <WH1288> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559> unto them,
The LORD <WH3068> bless <WH1288> thee, and keep <WH8104> thee:
The LORD <WH3068> make his face <WH6440> shine <WH215> upon thee, and be gracious <WH2603> unto thee:
The LORD <WH3068> lift up <WH5375> his countenance <WH6440> upon thee, and give <WH7760> thee peace <WH7965>.
And they shall put <WH7760> my name <WH8034> upon the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and I will bless <WH1288> them.
